casebody.data:
No. 08-1497. National Rifle Association of America, Inc., et al., Petitioners v. City of Chicago, Illinois, et al. 561 U.S. 1041, 130 S. Ct. 3543,

177 L. Ed. 2d 1119,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 5538. June 29, 2010.

The Court reversed the judgment below in McDonald v. Chicago, 561 U.S. 742, 130 S. Ct. 3020, 177 L. Ed. 2d 894 (2010). Therefore, petition for writ of certiorari granted, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit for further proceedings.

Same case below, 567 F.3d 856.
